item.title: Max Sprite ID 255 (Byte)
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:15, topic:403229"][quote author=Anc13ntsIsBack link=topic=500286.msg3676588#msg3676588 date=1311281829]

We figured it out about a week ago. & yes it has something to do with Bonzakid’s code. (We both work on RscReloaded).
Its client sided, and server side.

No shit? Go lern sum java bro, might be easier to fix simple problems like this.

If you can please tell us what we did, please do. Because I’m highly doubting you know. & I’m talking about explain it server side to.
[/quote]
Whatever you did, I bet you did it the hard way, altough, I can’t do what you requested atm, because I have no RSC source in my hands, I’m in a ship going to Stockholm(Saving you from googling it;It’s in Sweden).[/quote]
All we had to do is change about 4 little things. Wasn’t a hard way.
